channel.title: Homes on HOME
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on HOME

item.description: This is the personal website of Zepeng Mu (call me Phoenix). I am a fourth year undergraduate student from University of Chinese Academy of Sciences (UCAS), and I major in Biological Sciences. I will become a PhD student in Genetics, Genomcis, and Systems Biology at The University of Chicago in fall, 2018. My major interests are using genomics knowledge and technologies, together with proper statistical methods to investigate genetic architecture that is related to human diseases, particularlly cancer.
